So I have just started to have a good time playing CS:GO and I won a game solo. After that game a few hours later I played one with my friends and we won, so I was put on a 21hr cooldown for playing since I won 2 games in a day. These were competitive games so the cooldown is only for competitive but still. Just makes me rather wanna lose games so I can play more. How can you have a game and have something that stop players from playing the game?
very fun game and winning can feel extremely rewarding
An awesome game that will probably stay the same for many years.
bom pra quem gosta de passar raiva
its fun but don't be a dick

I've played since the early stages of the game. I enjoyed every monitor I've smashed playing this game. Good times. R.I.P. 4 monitors, 3 keyboards, 2 mice, my hand from countless swings. The Game is great but some games are ify. A lot has changed to improve the game and others that didn't so much. Great Game to mess around on though great community.

Это не игра в нормальном понимании, а киберспортивный шутер в котором для получения удовольствия нужно иметь хороший скилл. Если хотите получить приятное время за компом, то поиграйте к примеру в ГТА5.
